ComicInfo.Summary:
Bloodshot’s enemies are closing in. Can he unleash all of his abilities in time to survive?
The supersoldier is no stranger to war, but this is a whole new kind of enemy…
And who is the mysterious masked woman called Eidolon?!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------|----------------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Declan Shalvey | 1 | | B | Cover B | Dave Johnson | 2 | | C | Cover C | Simon Bisley | 3 | | D | Pre-Order Cover D | Brett Booth, Adelso Corona & Andrew Dalhouse | 4 |
